com.example.mobilibrary.DatabaseController

Class DatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.mobilibrary.DatabaseController.DatabaseHelper

  • public class DatabaseHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Nguyen, Jill; This class handles the database related tasks that are requested from other activities.
